string_table.string: Use the w, a, s, and d keys to move around the 360 degree image. Press the tab key to jump to interactive markers and hotspots.

slidelink.displaytext: Water analysis By Membrane Filtration Method
Testing - Total Viable Aerobic Count Continued
Prefiltration also referred to as initial, coarse, or depth filtration
Coconut shells and coal (anthracite or bituminous) are both inorganic sources of activated carbon
As per IP / USP the TVMC limit is
In membrane filtration large sample (upto ____________ ml ) can be analyzed
_____________ size filter papers are used for purified water analysis.
On mannitol salt agar s.aureus shows
MacConkeys agar is incubated at 42°C to 44°C for 24 to 48 hours.
The possible presence of P.aeudomonas is indicated by the growth of well-developed, bright green colour colonies.
For the testing of salmonella which media is required
Efficiency of Laminar Air Flow Filter should _______
Media should be preincubated atleast 48 hours at 30°C to 35°C.
Washing fluid _________________ the sample over filter paper and also helps to complete removal of sample from assembly
Assembly should be sterilized at 121°C for 15 minutes
